log4ahk

A class that provides simple logging facilities for AutoHotkey

This log-Class supports

  • Loglevels

  • Layout of the prepended string

Loglevels

Each message has to be logged on a certain loglevel. Consider the loglevel as the severity of the message you want to log: some logmessages are used for simple debug purposes, whereas other logmessages may indicate an Error.

  • Different hiearchical loglevels are Supported

  • The hierachy is trace (1) <- debug (2) <- info (3) <- warn (4) <- error (5) <- fatal (6)

Public Methods

this._log(
str,
this._loglevel.TRACE

Private Methods
_log()

Logs the given string at the given level

Parameters
str

String to be logged

loglvl

level on which the given message is to be logged

Internals

The given loglevel is compared against the global required fixlevel (see <required>) Is the given loglevel equal or greater the required loglevel the logmessage is printed - otherwise the logmessage is suppressed.
